tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_trade_data (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    exchange VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE trade_data (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    trade_amount DECIMAL,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50),
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    trade_type VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE arbitrage_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    strategy_performance DECIMAL,
    strategy_start_date DATE,
    strategy_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_trades (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  trade_volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT REFERENCES arbitrage_strategies(strategy_id),
  date_evaluated DATE,
  success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  average_roi DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
	trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	symbol TEXT,
	quantity INT,
	price DECIMAL,
	trade_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
	order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	symbol TEXT,
	quantity INT,
	price DECIMAL,
	order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TradeData (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  trade_symbol VARCHAR(255),
  trade_volume INT,
  trade_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE ArbitrageOpportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_date DATE,
  opportunity_symbols VARCHAR(255),
  opportunity_profit DECIMAL(10,2),
  opportunity_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_date DATE,
  metric_strategy VARCHAR(255),
  metric_return DECIMAL(10,2),
  metric_sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE StrategyBacktesting (
  backtest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  backtest_date DATE,
  backtest_strategy VARCHAR(255),
  backtest_win_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  backtest_max_drawdown DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE RiskMetrics (
  risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_date DATE,
  risk_strategy VARCHAR(255),
  risk_beta DECIMAL(10,2),
  risk_volatility DECIMAL(10,2)
);
